BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_title: Fullstack Starter Kit - Production-Ready Next.js & NestJS Boilerplate
Index.meta_description: A comprehensive, production-ready boilerplate for building any type of software project. Next.js 16, NestJS 10, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Redis, Better Auth, and more.
Index.hero_description: A comprehensive fullstack boilerplate with Next.js 16, NestJS 10, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and Better Auth. Everything you need to ship your next project.
Index.features_title: Everything You Need to Build Great Apps
Index.feature_modern_stack_description: Built with Next.js 16, NestJS 10, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS 4. Latest technologies for maximum productivity.
Index.feature_auth_description: Better Auth integration with email/password, OAuth, magic links, passkeys, and 2FA out of the box.
Index.feature_type_safety_description: End-to-end TypeScript with strict mode. Catch errors at compile time, not runtime.
Index.feature_database_description: PostgreSQL with TypeORM, Redis caching, and database migrations. Scale from day one.
Index.feature_testing_description: Jest, Vitest, and Playwright configured. Write tests with confidence.
Index.feature_production_description: Docker, monitoring, error tracking, and deployment scripts included. Ship with confidence.
Index.cta_section_description: Start with a solid foundation and focus on what makes your app unique.

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Dashboard.alternative_message: Need advanced features? Multi-tenancy & Teams, Roles & Permissions, Shadcn UI, End-to-End Typesafety with oRPC, Stripe Payment, Light / Dark mode. Try <url></url>.
